resources.string: 1. In what format is my Backup stored?
3. What is stored in the Backup?
5. How does the Auto â€“ Backup work?
Backup is stored in vCard format. It is a universal format used to store contacts
Backup is stored on sdcard, folder ContactsBackup, file Contacts.vcf
The information available in the contacts, everything is stored in the backup including the photos
Just click on the Contacts.vcf file, android will restore the contacts
a. Schedule weekly backup, select the day and time you want to backup
b. Backup will run in the background at the scheduled time and after complete a notification will appear
c. On clicking the notification, option to send the backup appears
